quote: But then life is never neat, it is made up of doors and trapdoors. You move down baroque corridors, and even when you think you know which door to open, you still need to have the courage to choose.
quote_letters: BUT THEN LIFE IS NEVER NEAT IT IS MADE UP OF DOORS AND TRAPDOORS YOU MOVE DOWN BAROQUE CORRIDORS AND EVEN WHEN YOU THINK YOU KNOW WHICH DOOR TO OPEN YOU STILL NEED TO HAVE THE COURAGE TO CHOOSE
